name: Poached Eggs
method: bring a saucepan of water to a light simmer
crack the egg into a container
drop the egg using the container into simmering water
placed a lid over the saucepan and leave the water simmer and poach the egg for 3/4 minutes
remove the egg from the water with a slotted spoon and plate!

name: Toast
method: once toaster pops bread, place on breadboard
